column2: "Da bi Saul ne ba Jonatan see aberantsɛ a ɔsoa n'akodze no dɛ
column3: Bra ma yɛnkɔ Filistiafo hɔn bansifo a wɔwɔ noho no nkyɛn. Na ɔannka annkyerɛ n'egya."

column2: "Nna Saul tse Gibea no kurotsia noho ara wɔ pɔmegranate eduaba a ɔwɔ Migron no n'ase: na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn hɔ bɛyɛ mbanyin ahaesia;"
"nna EWURADZE no sɔfoe Eli a ɔtse Siloh ne ba Finehas ne ba Ikabod no nua Ahitub ne ba Ahija no
column3: nna ɔhyɛ asɔfontar no. Nna ɔman no nnyim dɛ Jonatan kɔ."

column2: "Na kwan a Jonatan ɔhwehwɛ dɛ ɔfa mu kɔ Filistiafo hɔn bansifo no nkyɛn no ne ntamu n'afa ha wɔ ɔbotan mpatantwer
column3: na n'afa no so wɔ ɔbotan mpatantwer: na kor ne dzin dze Bozez
column4: na kor so ne dzin dze Sene."

column2: "Mpatantwer kor soɛr wɔ kwaamu afamu wɔ Mikmas tsentsendo
column3: na kor so wɔ pomu afamu wɔ Geba ne tsentsendo."

column2: "Na Jonatan see aberantsɛ a ɔso n'akodze no dɛ
column3: Bra ma yɛnkɔ monomonomfo yi hɔn bansifo no nkyɛn: annyɛ a gyangyanbiara EWURADZE bedzi dwuma bi ama hɛn: osiandɛ biribiara nnsiw EWURADZE kwan dɛ ɔdze pii anaa kumaabi bɛgye nkwa."

column2: "Na n'akodzesoafo no see no dɛ
column3: Yɛ dza ɔwɔ w'akoma mu nyinara; dan woho
column4: hwɛ meka wo ho dɛ mbrɛ w'akoma pɛ no ara."

column2: "Nna Jonatan see dɛ
column3: Yebotwa mu akɔ nkorɔfo no nkyɛn
column4: na yebeyi hɛnho akyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Sɛ wɔse hɛn dɛ
column3: Hom ngyina hɔ ma yɛmbra hom nkyɛn a; ɔno yebegyina hɛn ananmu dzinn
column4: na yɛnnkɔkɔ hɔn nkyɛn."

column2: "Na sɛ wɔse dɛ
column3: Hom mbra hɛn nkyɛn a; ɔno yɛbɔkɔ: osiandɛ EWURADZE eyi hɔn ahyɛ hɛn nsa: na iyi na ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hɛn."

column2: "Na hɔn beenu nyina yii hɔnho edzi kyerɛɛ Filistiafo hɔn bansifo no: na Filistiafo no see dɛ
column3: Wɔnhwɛ
column4: Hebriwfo no efifi etu a wokosumasumaa mu no mu epue wɔreba."

column2: "Na bansifo no see Jonatan na n'akodzesoafo no dɛ
column3: Hom mbra hɛn nkyɛn
column4: na yɛnkyerɛ hom biribi. Na Jonatan see n'akodzesoafo no dɛ
column6: na EWURADZE eyi hɔn ahyɛ Israel nsa."

column2: "Na Jonatan dze ne nsa na n'anan fowee na n'akodzesoafo no dzii n'ekyir: na Filistiafo no totɔr Jonatan n'enyim; na n'akodzesoafo no dzii n'ekyir kunkum hɔn."
"Na ku a odzi kan a Jonatan na n'akodzesoafo no kumii no
column3: ɔbɛyɛ nyimpa eduonu
column4: ɔbɛyɛ nantwi mpamho funtum kwan fa do."

column2: "Na ahopopo baa nseraban no mu
column3: haban no mu
column4: na ɔman no nyinara hɔn mu; bansifo no na adzesɛɛfo no
column5: hɔn so hɔn ho popoe: na asaase wosowee; na ahohim kɛse mbordo baa hɔ."

column2: "Na Saul n'aweɔmfo a wɔwɔ Benjamin-Gibea no hwɛe; na wohun dɛ nyimpa dodow no wɔrotwe
column3: na wɔkɔ ha ba ha."

column2: "Na Saul see nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no dɛ
column3: Afei wɔnkan na wonhu nyia oefi hɛn mu kɔ. Na wɔkanee no
column4: na
column6: Jonatan na n'akodzesoafo no wonnyi hɔ."

column2: "Na Saul see Ahija dɛ
column3: Fa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no bra ha. Osiandɛ aber no na Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no wɔ Israelmba nkyɛn wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Saul rekasa kyerɛ ɔsɔfo no
column4: nna begyabegya no a ɔbaa Filistiafo hɔn asesee mu no da ho ara dze mu
column5: na ɔyɛɛ kɛse: na Saul see ɔsɔfo no dɛ

column2: "Na Saul na nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyinara boaa ano
column3: na wɔbaa akono: na
column4: hwɛ
column5: hɔn nyinara dze hɔn mfona dzii hɔnho mpatakitsa
column6: na ɔko mbusu kɛsenara baa hɔ."

column2: "Afei Hebriwfo a wofi ɔman a etwa ho ehyia no mu a nna wɔka Filistiafo no ho ma wɔnye hɔn kɔr nseraban no mu no so mpo danee bɛkaa Israelfo a wɔka Saul na Jonatan ho no ho."
"Dɛmara so na Israel mbarimba a wɔdze hɔnho kosumaa Efraim nkokodo nkurow mu no
column3: so tsee dɛ Filistiafo eguan no
column4: hɔn so mpo wotui taa hɔn do wɔ ɔko no mu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE gyee Israel nkwa da no: na ɔko no twaa mu traa Bɛt-aven."
"Na Israel mbarimba tseetsee da no: osiandɛ Saul kaa ntam guu ɔman no do
column3: dɛ
column4: Mpaa nka nyimpa a obedzi edziban biara gyedɛ ewimbir ana
column5: ma mindzi m'atamfo wer. Dɛm ntsi ɔman no mu obiara ammfa edziban annka n'ano."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara baa kwaa no mu; nna ewo wɔ daadze no do."
"Na aber a ɔman no baa kwaa no mu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: nna ewo rososɔ na nyimpa biara ammfa ne nsa annkɔ n'ano
column5: nna ɔman no suro ntam no."

column2: "Na Jonatan dze
column3: aber a n'egya dze ntam rebra ɔman no
column4: ɔanntse: dɛm ntsi ɔdze poma a ɔdze ne nsamu no n'ano dze bɔɔ ewokyɛm no mu
column5: na ɔdze ne nsa kɔr n'ano; na n'enyiwa do tsetseew no."

column2: "Nna ɔman no mu obi buae see dɛ
column3: W'egya dze ntam abra ɔman no ketsee dɛ
column4: Nyimpa a obedzi edziban bi ndɛ da yi no mpaa nka no. Na nkorɔfo no tɔɔ bitsi."

column2: "Nna Jonatan see dɛ
column3: M'egya afona asaase yi: meserɛ hom
column4: hom nhwɛ
column5: osiandɛ mekaa ewo kakra mohwɛe ntsi
column6: mbrɛ m'enyiwa do edua atsetsew me."

column2: "Na sɛ nkyɛ ɔman yi dzii hɔn atamfo asadze a wonyae no bi dze ɛ? Afei nkyɛ oku kɛse na ɔbɛba Filistiafo no mu."
"Na da no wokum Filistiafo no mu bi fi Mikmas kodur Aijalon: na ɔman no tɔɔ bitsi dodoodow."
"Na ɔman no tui hyɛɛ asadze no do
column3: na wɔfaa nguan
column4: na anantwi
column6: na wokunkum hɔn wɔ daadze: na ɔman no dze bɔgya kaa ho dzii."

column2: "Nna wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: ɔman no reyɛ bɔn tsia EWURADZE
column5: dɛ wɔdze bɔgya aka ho ridzi. Na ɔsee dɛ
column6: Hom etwa nkontompɔ: wompirew ɔbo kɛse mbrɛ me ndɛ."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Hom mpetse nkɔ ɔman no mu
column4: na wɔnkɛse hɔn dɛ
column6: na nyimpa biara mfa no guan mbrɛ me ha
column7: na wonkunkum hɔn wɔ ha ndzi: na mma wɔnnyɛ bɔn nntsia EWURADZE dɛ wɔdze bɔgya no bɛka ho edzi. Na ɔman no nyinara mu nyimpa biara dze ne nantwi baa anadwe no

column2: "Na Saul sii afɔrmbukyia maa EWURADZE: ɔnoara nye afɔrmbukyia kan dze a osii maa EWURADZE."
"Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Hom mma yensian nketsiw Filistiafo anadwe yi
column4: na yɛnsɛɛ hɔn nkodu adzekyee
column5: na mma yenngyaa hɔn mu nyimpa biara. Na wɔsee dɛ
column6: Biribiara a oye wɔ w'enyi do no
column7: yɛ. Nna ɔsɔfo no see dɛ
column8: Hom mma yɛntwe mpin Nyankopɔn nkyɛn wɔ ha."

column2: "Na Saul bisaa Nyankopɔn hɔ apam dɛ
column3: Ana minsian minketsiw Filistiafo no anaa? Ana ibeyi hɔn ahyɛ Israel nsa a? Naaso oemmbua no da no."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Hom ntwe mpin ha
column4: hom ɔman mu etsitsir nyinara: na hom nhwɛ na wonhu adze kor a bɔn yi wɔ mu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na dɛ EWURADZE a ɔgye Israel nkwa tse ase yi
column3: sɛ ɔwɔ me ba Jonatan mpo mu a
column4: owu na obowu. Na ɔman no nyinara mu nyimpa biara emmbua no."

column2: "Nna ɔsee Israel nyinara dɛ
column3: Hom nkedzi fakor
column4: ma emi na me ba Jonatan so nkedzi fakor. Na ɔman no see Saul dɛ
column5: Dza oye wɔ w'enyi do no yɛ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Saul see EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: dɛ
column5: Da nokwar edzi. Na tonto bɔɔ Jonatan na Saul: na ɔman no wofii mu."

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Hom ntwe emi na me ba Jonatan ntamu tonto. Na ɔbɔɔ Jonatan."

column2: "Nna Saul see Jonatan dɛ
column3: Ka dza ayɛ kyerɛ me. Na Jonatan kaa kyerɛɛ no
column4: see dɛ
column5: Ɔka na medze poma a ɔdze me nsamu no n'ano mekaa ewo kakra mosɔe hwɛe; na

column2: "Na Saul see dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn nyɛ dɛm na bi so nka ho: na owu ara na ibowu Jonatan."

column2: "Na ɔman no see Saul dɛ
column3: Aso Jonatan nwu
column4: nyia ɔayɛ Israel mu nkwagye kɛse edwuma yi a? Nyankopɔn mpa ngu: dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column5: ne tsinhwi kor mpo ronntɔ famu; osiandɛ ɔnye Nyankopɔn na wɔayɛ edwuma ndɛ da yi. Nna ɔman no gyee Jonatan

column2: "Nna Saul gyaa Filistiafo no ekyir dzi na osii mu kɔree: na Filistiafo no kɔr hɔnankasa hɔn man mu."
"Afei aber a Saul nyaa Israel do ahendzi no
column3: ɔnye n'atamfo nyinara kɔkoe hyiae
column4: Moab
column8: na Filistiafo no kɔkoe: na beebiara a ɔdaan noho kɔree no

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ mbanyindze
column3: na okunkum Amalekfo
column4: na ɔgyee Israel fii hɔn a wɔsɛɛ hɔn no nsamu."

column2: "Afei Saul ne mbabanyin nye Jonatan
column3: na Isvi
column4: na Malkisua: na ne mbabaa beenu no hɔn edzin nye yi; abakan no ne dzin dze Merab
column5: na ekumaba no ne dzin dze Mikal:"

column2: "na Saul ne yer dzin dze Ahinoam
column3: Ahimaaz ne babaa a: na no dɔm mu ɔsafohen ne dzin dze Abner
column4: Saul n'egya no nua Ner ne babanyin a."

column2: "Na Saul n'egya Kish na Abner n'egya Ner wɔyɛ Abiel ne mbabanyin."
"Na akodzi dzendzenndzen daa Filistiafo do wɔ Saul ne nda nyinara mu: na sɛ Saul hu ɔbarimba katakyi biara
column3: anaa ɔbarimba a ɔyɛ ndam a
column4: nna ɔafa no aba ne nkyɛn."
